name: itemFramesActivatePressurePlates
description: Item Frames inside wooden pressure plates hold them down

name: oldFishingLoot
description: Reverts the fishing loot to how it was before 1.16

name: blastFurnaceSmoothQuartz
description: Quartz Blocks can be smelted to Smooth Quartz in a Blast Furnace
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: infinityNeedsArrow
description: A Bow enchanted with Infinity needs the player to have an arrow in their inventory

name: anvilledIce
description: Custom amount of frosted ice crushed by falling anvils make one ice. Allows for new type of ice farm.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 32

name: easyDispenserCrafting
description: Dispensers can be crafted in full stacks with a dropper plus the raw materials of a bow
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: redstoneLampTurnOffDelay
description: Delay in game ticks for Redstone Lamps to turn off
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 8

name: longerRepeaters
description: Repeaters on top of Redstone Blocks multiply their delay by set amount

name: easyBlueIceCrafting
description: Blue Ice can be crafted from Ice and Blue Dye
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: infiniteLavaSources
description: Lava creates infinite sources like Water

name: unpackableIce
description: Blue Ice and Packed Ice can be crafted into set amount of Packed Ice and Normal Ice accordingly
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 9

name: dragonDrops
description: Ender Dragon drops selected item(s) when killed

name: unpackableNetherWart
description: Nether Wart Blocks can be crafted into set amount of Nether Warts
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 9

name: honeyCombStickiness
description: Honey Comb only sticks to selected Blocks
extras: Will render Ghost Blocks on the Client when mod is only Server Side
validators: Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: stonecutterDamage
description: How much damage Stonecutters deal when stepping on them
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 10

name: basaltToLavaConversion
description: Basalt converts to a Lava source when placed (or moved) next to a Lava Source, Flowing Lava and a Magma Block

name: concreteConvertOnCauldron
description: Concrete powder converts to concrete blocks when on top of a filled cauldron

name: eggWaterDrag
description: How fast thrown Eggs can travel under water. 0.99 is the default for above water and for Tridents
extras: Thrown Egg will stutter on client when mod is only on server
validators: You must choose a value from 0.5 to 0.99

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: easyChestCrafting
description: Chests can be crafted out of logs
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: cactusFurnaceXp
description: Amount of XP a Cactus smelted in a furnace gives
extras: 1 XP per Cactus seems to be a bug, as in Bedrock Edition it's only 0.2, which fits more in line with other items
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 1

name: silkTouchSpawners
description: Mining Spawners with a Silk Touch tool will drop itself

name: craftableNameTags
description: Name Tags can be crafted with Paper and Iron or String or both
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: cobbleCrushing
description: Cobblestone crushed by a falling Anvil will convert into Gravel
extras: Carpet-Extra's renewableSand is prioritized over this

name: craftableHorseArmor
description: Horse Armor can be crafted in vanilla_style (H-shape), with_saddle (like in VanillaTweaks) or with armor_pieces
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: sculkBlocksAlwaysDropXp
description: Sculk blocks always drop XP when destroyed
extras: Allows for fully automatic XP farms without a wither

name: lilyPadsOnCauldron
description: Lily Pads can be placed on Cauldrons

name: commandSkull
description: A command that gives the executing Player the Player Head of the selected Player
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: blastFurnaceNetherBrick
description: Netherrack can be smelted to Nether Brick in a Blast Furnace
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: silkTouchPathBlocks
description: Mining Path Blocks with a Silk Touch tool will drop itself

name: silkTouchBuddingAmethysts
description: Mining Budding Amethysts with a Silk Touch tool will drop itself

name: splashOxidize
description: Copper blocks oxidize one stage when hit with a water bottle

name: commandSlimeChunk
description: A command that shows if the current chunk is a slime chunk based on the set slimeChunkPercentage
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: blastFurnaceStone
description: Cobblestone to Stone to Smooth Stone can be smelted in a Blast Furnace
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: easyMinecartsCrafting
description: The special Minecarts can be crafted like normal Minecarts with the matching Block in the middle
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: enderPearlWaterDrag
description: How fast thrown Ender Pearls can travel under water. 0.99 is the default for above water and for Tridents
extras: Thrown Pearl will stutter on client when mod is only on server
validators: You must choose a value from 0.5 to 0.99

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: villagersAlwaysConvert
description: Villagers killed by Zombies will always convert to Zombie Villagers regardless of difficulty

name: dragonXpDrop
description: Amount of XP dropped by later Dragons. The first Dragon always drops 12000
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 12000

name: kelpBlockHardness
description: How long Kelp Blocks take to mine in survival
extras: Any value other than 0 will behave like 0.5 for clients without this mod
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 0.5

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: strictShulkerShells
description: Shulkers always drop a given amount of shulker shells when killed
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 4

name: blastFurnaceGlazedTerracotta
description: Dyed Terracotta can be smelted to the corresponding Glazed Terracotta in a Blast Furnace
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: commandMaxEffect
description: A command to quickly give the player the specified effect for infinite time and at max level
extras: This is basically just an alias for: `/effect give @s <effect> 999999 255 true`
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: anvilledBlueIce
description: Custom amount of packed ice crushed by falling anvils make one blue ice.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 32

name: powderToGlassSmelting
description: Concrete Powder can be smelted to Glass of the corresponding color
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: netherrackGeneration
description: Netherrack is generated instead of Cobblestone if a Magma Block is below

name: endCrystalPlacementRestriction
description: End Crystals can only be placed on Obsidian and Bedrock Blocks

name: commandMods
description: A command listing all mods installed on the server
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: slimeChunkPercentage
description: The percentage of chunks that are Slime chunks
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100 that is a multiple of 10

name: tameCatsWithCookedFish
description: Cats can also be tamed with cooked Cod and Salmon, not just with raw

name: silkTouchFarmland
description: Mining Farmland with a Silk Touch tool will drop itself

name: playerHeadDrops
description: Players drop their head

name: easyBoneBlockCrafting
description: Bone Blocks can be crafted out of Bones
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: villagersDropEmeralds
description: Villagers drop between 1 and x Emeralds on death, where x is the given number
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 5

name: noCreeperGriefing
description: Prevents Creepers from destroying blocks

name: easyHarvesting
description: Right clicking on fully grown crops harvests and immediately replants it
extras: Works on all crops, nether warts, cocoa beans, sugarcane, cacti, bamboo, kelp and twisting, weeping and cave vines

name: silenceMobs
description: Mobs named with 'silence_me' stop making noise

name: tallPlantNoUpdate
description: Tall Plants do not update blocks around the top part if the bottom half got broken
extras: Old Bug: MC-31038

name: campSleeping
description: Allows players to sleep in a Bed without setting their spawn point by entering while sneaking. Requires the main hand to be empty

name: unpackableAmethysts
description: Amethyst Blocks can be crafted into set amount of Amethyst Shards
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 9

name: missingCobbleRecipes
description: Adds missing recipes for allowing blackstone and cobbled deepslate in place of cobblestone
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: basaltToBlackstoneConversion
description: Basalt converts to Blackstone if next to both Lava and Water

name: craftableNotchApple
description: Enchanted Golden Apples can be crafted with 8 Gold Blocks again
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: commandPeek
description: A command that shows the Inventory or Ender Chest of the specified player
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: blastFurnaceGlass
description: Sand and Red Sand can be smelted to Glass Blocks in a Blast Furnace
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: peacefulHunger
description: Players do not lose any hunger like in peaceful mode

name: craftableCobwebs
description: Cobwebs can be crafted with 5 Strings in a cross pattern or with a 3x3 full area
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: gravelCrushing
description: Gravel crushed by a falling Anvil will convert into Sand

name: universalDyeing
description: Allows to dye already dyed things and clean Glass, Glass Panes and Terracotta with a Water Bucket in the Crafting Table
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: anvilledPackedIce
description: Custom amount of ice crushed by falling anvils make one packed ice.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 32

name: smokerLimeDye
description: Sea Pickles can be cooked into Lime Dye in a Smoker
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: craftableTuff
description: Craft tuff from andesite and cobblestone
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: shapelessCrafting
description: Bread, Paper and Shulker Boxes can be crafted in a 2x2 field
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: concreteMixing
description: Sand falling on Gravel (or the other way around) with a Concrete Block below will blend to Concrete Powder colored like the Concrete Block below
extras: In combination with cobbleCrushing and gravelCrushing allows for an automatic Concrete generator

name: easyTrappedChestCrafting
description: Trapped Chests can be crafted out of logs and a Tripwire Hook
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: commandSudo
description: A command that executes a command or sends a chat message as the selected Player
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: snowballWaterDrag
description: How fast thrown Snowballs can travel under water. 0.99 is the default for above water and for Tridents
extras: Thrown Snowball will stutter on client when mod is only on server
validators: You must choose a value from 0.5 to 0.99

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

description: Crafting Logs to Wood gives 4 instead of 3

name: zombifiedPiglinsSpawningInPortals
description: Allows Zombified Piglins to spawn inside Nether Portals

name: easyStickCrafting
description: Sticks can be crafted out of logs
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: commandFrame
description: A command that makes the nearest item frame in a 5 Block radius around the player, that holds an item, invisible or visible
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, true/false for everyone/no one, or a custom permission level

name: snowMelting
description: Whether snow can melt

name: unpackableQuartz
description: Quartz Blocks can be crafted into set amount of Quartz
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 9

name: enderEyeDropChance
description: The chance of Ender Eyes dropping when thrown
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100

name: reachDistance
description: Reach in which you can place and break blocks. Value will be 0.5 higher in creative
extras: Mod needed on server and client for this feature to work
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: smokerGreenDye
description: Cacti can be cooked into Green Dye in a Smoker. XP override of cactusFurnaceXp still applies
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: noGhastGriefing
description: Prevents Ghasts from destroying blocks

name: unpackableWool
description: White Wool Blocks can be crafted into set amount of String
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 9

name: blastFurnaceSmoothSandStone
description: Sandstone and Red Sandstone can be smelted to the smooth variant in a Blast Furnace
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: dragonEggConvertsCobbleToEndstone
description: Dragon Eggs will convert Cobble under them to Endstone either on set event

name: foodInstantHeal
description: Food heals hearts not hunger like in the first MC versions and naturalRegeneration is off
extras: Recommended to combine with peacefulHunger

name: zeroTickPlants
description: Brings back the ability to force grow certain plants using 0-ticks

name: stalagmiteSteppingDamage
description: Pointed Dripstones (stalagmites) deal damage when standing on them. Sneaking prevents this
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 10

name: woodcutting
description: The Stonecutter can be used for all wood types
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: enderPearlDamage
description: Amount of damage dealt by Ender Pearls
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 10

name: noEndermanGriefing
description: Prevents Endermen from picking up and placing blocks

name: maxBannerLayers
description: Maximum number of layers, that can be applied to a banner
extras: This only works for clients with this mod installed and the Banner tooltips never show more than 6 layers
validators: You must choose a value from 3 to 16

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: moreFortressSpawningBlocks
description: What blocks Fortress mobs can spawn on inside the bigger Bounding Box
extras: off: nether bricks only / more: (red) nether bricks, netherrack, soul sand/soil, packed/blue ice, gravel, magma blocks / all: all

name: easyRepeaterCrafting
description: Repeaters can be crafted with the raw materials for Redstone Torches
extras: Expect a lag spike when changing the value

name: antiCheatDisabled
description: Prevents players from rubberbanding when moving too fast
extras: ... or being kicked out for 'flying'
Puts more trust in clients positioning

name: carpets
description: Placing carpets may issue carpet commands for non-op players

name: combineXPOrbs
description: XP orbs combine with other into bigger orbs

name: commandCameramode
description: Enables /c and /s commands to quickly switch between camera and survival modes

Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

description: Enables /distance command to measure in game distance between points

extras: ... allows for drawing simple shapes
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

if 'carpets' rule is turned on as well

Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

description: Enables /log command to monitor events via chat and overlays
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

description: Enables /perimeterinfo command

Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

description: Enables /player command to control/spawn players
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

description: Enables /script command

validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

name: commandTrackAI
description: Allows to track mobs AI via /track command
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

name: ctrlQCraftingFix
description: Dropping entire stacks works also from on the crafting UI result slot

name: customMOTD
description: Sets a different motd message on client trying to connect to the server
extras: use '_' to use the startup setting from server.properties

name: defaultLoggers
description: sets these loggers in their default configurations for all new players
extras: use csv, like 'tps,mobcaps' for multiple loggers, none for nothing

name: desertShrubs
description: Saplings turn into dead shrubs in hot climates and no water access

name: disableSpawnChunks
description: Allows spawn chunks to unload

name: explosionNoBlockDamage
description: Explosions won't destroy blocks

name: extremeBehaviours
description: Edge cases are as frequent as common cases, for testing only!!
extras: Velocities of items from dispensers, blaze projectiles, fireworks
Directions of fireballs, wither skulls, fishing bobbers,
items dropped from blocks and inventories, llamas spit, triggered trap horses
Damage dealt with projectiles
Blaze aggro sensitivity
Mobs spawned follow range

name: fastRedstoneDust
description: Lag optimizations for redstone dust
extras: by Theosib

name: fillLimit
description: Customizable fill/clone volume limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 20M

name: fillUpdates
description: fill/clone/setblock and structure blocks cause block updates

name: flatWorldStructureSpawning
description: Allows structure mobs to spawn in flat worlds

name: flippinCactus
description: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding cactus
extras: Doesn't cause block updates when rotated/flipped
Applies to pistons, observers, droppers, repeaters, stairs, glazed terracotta etc...

name: forceloadLimit
description: Customizable forceload chunk limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 20M

name: hardcodeTNTangle
description: Sets the horizontal random angle on TNT for debugging of TNT contraptions
extras: Set to -1 for default behavior
validators: Must be between 0 and 2pi, or -1

name: honeySlime
description: Orange stained glass behaves like slime, but doesn't stick to it
extras: Only available for 1.14. in 1.15 use honey instead

name: hopperCounters
description: hoppers pointing to wool will count items passing through them
extras: Enables /counter command, and actions while placing red and green carpets on wool blocks
Use /counter <color?> reset to reset the counter, and /counter <color?> to query
In survival, place green carpet on same color wool to query, red to reset the counters
Counters are global and shared between players, 16 channels available
Items counted are destroyed, count up to one stack per tick per hopper
validators: It has an accompanying command

name: horseWanderingFix
description: Prevents horses and other mobs to wander into the distance after dismounting
extras: Fixes issues with various Joergens wandering off and disappearing client-side

name: huskSpawningInTemples
description: Only husks spawn in desert temples

name: interactionUpdates
description: placing blocks cause block updates

name: kelpGenerationGrowthLimit
description: limits growth limit of newly naturally generated kelp to this amount of blocks
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 25. 25 and all natural kelp can grow 25 blocks, choose 0 to make all generated kelp not to grow

name: lagFreeSpawning
description: Spawning requires much less CPU and Memory

name: leadFix
description: Fixes leads breaking/becoming invisible in unloaded chunks
extras: You may still get visibly broken leash links on the client side, but server side the link is still there.

name: maxEntityCollisions
description: Customizable maximal entity collision limits, 0 for no limits
validators: Must be a positive number

name: mergeTNT
description: Merges stationary primed TNT entities

name: miningGhostBlockFix
description: Fixes mining ghost blocks by trusting clients with block breaking
extras: Increases player allowed mining distance to 32 blocks

name: missingTools
description: Pistons, Glass and Sponge can be broken faster with their appropriate tools

name: movableBlockEntities
description: Pistons can push block entities, like hoppers, chests etc.

name: onePlayerSleeping
description: One player is required on the server to cause night to pass

name: optimizedTNT
description: TNT causes less lag when exploding in the same spot and in liquids

name: persistentParrots
description: Parrots don't get of your shoulders until you receive proper damage

name: placementRotationFix
description: fixes block placement rotation issue when player rotates quickly while placing blocks

name: portalCaching
description: Alternative, persistent caching strategy for nether portals

name: portalCreativeDelay
description: Portals won't let a creative player go through instantly
extras: Holding obsidian in either hand won't let you through at all

name: portalSuffocationFix
description: Nether portals correctly place entities going through
extras: Entities shouldn't suffocate in obsidian

name: pushLimit
description: Customizable piston push limit
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 1024

name: quasiConnectivity
description: Pistons, droppers and dispensers react if block above them is powered

name: railPowerLimit
description: Customizable powered rail power range
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 1024

name: renewableCoral
description: Coral structures will grow with bonemeal from coral plants

name: renewableSponges
description: Guardians turn into Elder Guardian when struck by lightning

name: rotatorBlock
description: Cactus in dispensers rotates blocks.
extras: Rotates block anti-clockwise if possible

name: scriptsAutoload
description: Scarpet script from world files will autoload on server/world start
extras: if /script is enabled

name: shulkerSpawningInEndCities
description: Shulkers will respawn in end cities

name: silverFishDropGravel
description: Silverfish drop a gravel item when breaking out of a block

name: smoothClientAnimations
description: smooth client animations with low tps settings
extras: works only in SP, and will slow down players

name: stackableShulkerBoxes
description: Empty shulker boxes can stack to 64 when dropped on the ground
extras: To move them around between inventories, use shift click to move entire stacks

name: summonNaturalLightning
description: summoning a lightning bolt has all the side effects of natural lightning

name: superSecretSetting
description: Gbhs sgnf sadsgras fhskdpri!

name: tntDoNotUpdate
description: TNT doesn't update when placed against a power source

name: tntPrimerMomentumRemoved
description: Removes random TNT momentum when primed

name: tntRandomRange
description: Sets the tnt random explosion range to a fixed value

validators: optimizedTNT must be enabled
Cannot be negative, except for -1

name: unloadedEntityFix
description: Entities pushed or moved into unloaded chunks no longer disappear

name: viewDistance
description: Changes the view distance of the server.

validators: You must choose a value from 0 (use server settings) to 32

name: xpNoCooldown
description: Players absorb XP instantly, without delay

name: creativeFlyDrag
description: Creative air drag
extras: Increased drag will slow down your flight
So need to adjust speed accordingly
With 1.0 drag, using speed of 11 seems to matching vanilla speeds.
Purely client side setting, meaning that
having it set on the decicated server has no effect
but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well
validators: Must be between 0 and 1

Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: creativeFlySpeed
description: Creative flying speed multiplier
extras: Purely client side setting, meaning that
having it set on the decicated server has no effect
but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well
validators: Must be a positive number

Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: creativeNoClip
description: Creative No Clip
extras: On servers it needs to be set on both
client and server to function properly.
Has no effect when set on the server only
Can allow to phase through walls
if only set on the carpet client side
but requires some trapdoor magic to
allow the player to enter blocks
validators: Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: fastRedstoneDust
description: Lag optimizations for redstone dust
extras: by Theosib
.. also fixes some locational behaviours or vanilla redstone MC-11193
so behaviour of locational vanilla contraptions is not guaranteed

name: fogOff
description: Removes fog from client in the nether and the end
extras: Improves visibility, but looks weird
validators: Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: language
description: sets the language for carpet

name: portalCreativeDelay
description: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in creative
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 72000

name: portalSurvivalDelay
description: Amount of delay ticks to use a nether portal in survival
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 72000

name: scriptsAutoload
description: Scarpet script from world files will autoload on server/world start
extras: if /script is enabled

name: smoothClientAnimations
description: smooth client animations with low tps settings
extras: works only in SP, and will slow down players
validators: Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: spawnChunksSize
description: Changes size of spawn chunks
extras: Defines new radius
setting it to 0 - disables spawn chunks

name: allowSpawningOfflinePlayers
description: Spawn offline players in online mode if online-mode player with specified name does not exist
validators: It has an accompanying command

name: chainStone
description: Chains will stick to each other on the long ends
extras: and will stick to other blocks that connect to them directly.
With stick_to_all: it will stick even if not visually connected

name: cleanLogs
description: Removes abnoxious messages from the logs
extras: Doesn't display 'Maximum sound pool size 247 reached'
Which is normal with decent farms and contraptions
validators: Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: commandDraw
description: Enables /draw commands
extras: ... allows for drawing simple shapes or
other shapes which are sorta difficult to do normally
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

name: commandPlayer
description: Enables /player command to control/spawn players
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

name: commandScriptACE
description: Enables restrictions for arbitrary code execution with scarpet
extras: Users that don't have this permission level
won't be able to load apps or /script run.
It is also the permission level apps will
have when running commands with run()
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level
When changing the rule, you must at least have the permission level you are trying to give it

name: commandSpawn
description: Enables /spawn command for spawn tracking
validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

name: commandTick

Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

name: commandTrackAI

validators: It has an accompanying command
Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

description: Creative air drag
extras: Increased drag will slow down your flight
So need to adjust speed accordingly
With 1.0 drag, using speed of 11 seems to matching vanilla speeds.
Purely client side setting, meaning that
having it set on the decicated server has no effect
but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well

Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: structureBlockIgnored
description: Changes the block ignored by the Structure Block

extras: WARNING: Needs to be permanent for correct loading.
Setting 'structureBlockIgnored' to air is recommended
when saving massive structures.
Required on client of player editing the Structure Block.
'structureBlockOutlineDistance' may be required for
correct rendering of long structures.
validators: You have to choose a value greater or equal to 48

description: Gbhs sgnf sadsgras fhskdpri!!!

name: updateSuppressionBlock
description: Placing an activator rail on top of a barrier block will update suppress when the rail turns off.
extras: Entering an integer will make the update suppression block auto-reset
Integer entered is the delay in ticks for it to reset
validators: Cannot be negative, can be true, false, or # > 0

name: carpetCommandPermissionLevel
description: Carpet command permission level. Can only be set via .conf file
validators: This setting can only be set by admins with op level 4

description: Disables breaking of blocks caused by flowing liquids

name: movableAmethyst

extras: Allow for them to be moved by pistons
as well as adds extra drop when mining with silk touch pickaxe

description: Required permission level for /perf command

extras: Enables /counter command, and actions while placing red and green carpets on wool blocks
Use /counter <color?> reset to reset the counter, and /counter <color?> to query
In survival, place green carpet on same color wool to query, red to reset the counters
Counters are global and shared between players, 16 channels available
Items counted are destroyed, count up to one stack per tick per hopper
